title: (2560) Torres Vedras - Barro
description: Municipal Motorhome Parking very well located with all services for free, no reserved parking spaces, you can park on any spot, nice green park and dog park just in front, all connected via a cycling lane, many supermarkets and a fast-food around the corner.

title: (2560-683) Torres Vedras - Rua Villenave d`Ornon

title_short: (2560-295) Torres Vedras - 1 Rua António Augusto Cabral

title: (2560) Torres Vedras - Barro

Great for visiting the city, the Castle and other attractions. Very good to park during Carnival. Great park area near Expotorres. No services. Only parking. Quiet and near by the town center, 5 minutes walk.

title: (2560) A dos Cunhados - 45 Rua do Sol
title_short: (2560) A dos Cunhados - 45 Rua do Sol
description:
We offer space for campervans & motorhomes in a natural, peaceful and silent environment. We respect people, animals and nature.

At Lugar do Sol we live in an ecological, sustainable and self-sufficient way, energy comes from the sun, water comes from our well, we have a biological garden and we produce cosmetics and natural detergents.

In the shared areas, there is: a dry bathroom with hot shower, shared kitchen, our biological garden, a small swimming pool that delights the kids and adults, an area for the little ones and all the space to disconnect from everyday life, relax and meditate.

We have 3 dogs, chickens, ducks, fishes, frogs etc. and more animals are welcome.

Equipment available for fun: surfboard, bikes and tools for minor repairs. 

We also have a caravan and a small sustainable house available for rent. Built with recycled glass bottles, straw, lime, old wood and lots of love.)

Contact us if you want to know more about our projects and how you can participate.

Please contact in advance to confirm availability.

To find us follow the GPS and look for a Bambu gate.

We have special prices for long stays!

Enjoy!

title: (2640) Encarnação - 9 Rua de São Domingos
description: Jardim do Pão, tables, barbecue, toilets.

title: (2560) A dos Cunhados - 84 Rua do Navio

New parking for motorhomes where overnight stays are explicitly authorized.
As of today (July 7, 2023) it seems to be finishing to enable the area but already indicated.
It is a parking shared with other vehicles and slightly inclined, but with nice views

title: (2580-000) São Pedro da Cadeira - 2 Rua Beira Rio
title_short: (2580-000) São Pedro da Cadeira - 2 Rua Beira Rio
description: RV park: area in a large dune area of the Sizandro river, quiet and perfect for resting away from the big tourist crowds. Equipped with a faucet, as well as gray and black disposal. In the evening a bread/bun supplier comes by (makes himself known by honking/trumpeting) Good for the Portuguese state.

title: (2560) Silveira - 6E Avenida Alto da Vela
description: Beautiful spot on Praia dos Amoeiras. Attention, pretty steep road goes down to the beach, only accessible for vans or 4x4. The parking has enough place for about 10 cars only, we were the only ones staying overnight in mid-June. Some local fishermen in the morning. No services.

title: (2560) Silveira - 2 Avenida Alto da Vela
description: Great place for parking. Beautiful views of the ocean. Quiet place for the night, near houses and with ilumination.

title: (2560) Silveira - 14 Avenida Alto da Vela
description: Beautiful spot with a great view of the sea. Access to the beach at the foot of the cliff (Praia das Amoeiras) is via a path that is 200 m. A belvedere is accessible at 300 m and the services are at the city of Santa Cruz which is at 1 Km. Super sight at night on the city of Santa Cruz and the coast towards Peniche. Quiet night, only rocked by the sea. The parking has two accesses, used the one above.

title: (2560) Silveira - 40 Avenida Alto da Vela
description: Nice place with a great view. We didn't see any prohibition signs.

title: (2560) Silveira - Av. Alto da Vela
description: Beautiful vantage point, no prohibition signs for campers. Are high with 7.5m camper, no problem.

title: (2560) torres vedras - 12 Avenida do Atlântico Praia de Santa Cruz
title_short: (2560) torres vedras - 12 Avenida do Atlântico Praia de Santa Cruz
description: Parking, to avoid in summer during the day. Great ocean view beach for surfing. Very good from September to June.

title: (2560) Silveira - 62b Avenida Alto da Vela
description: Great place to park, in front of the Praia da Formosa, in the center of Santa Cruz. We stayed here for one night, over a weekend in January 2023. Very quiet and peaceful during the night.

title: (2640) Encarnação - Rua do Caldeirão
description: A place in the apple trees near a cemetery. It's not the best place in the world. But we were already at the picnic area in town and realized that it was just a parking lot in front of a house. Here we are close to the road but the noise is imperceptible in the van. in October we saw no one and were not disturbed.

Great spot for night, we have been here off season and it was all empty. Summer can be crowdy I guess.
Ocean view, beach just there. Showers even in off season. Good waves, nobody in water.

South of Santal Cruz, 2 car parks at the top of the cliffs. Very fun mountain biking from the car park to St Rita via the paragliding spot and plenty of parkings in the countryside.

title: (2560) A dos Cunhados - Praia do Seixo
title_short: (2560) A dos Cunhados - Praia do Seixo
description: Very quiet place between the pines with many places (more than 10 in my opinion). During the day there are a lot of people who come to eat under the pines but it remains very calm, at the end of the afternoon everyone leaves, we were 2 vans and 1 motorhome. Accessible for all types of vehicles, in the area you will not find anything better, especially when it comes to shelter from the wind !! ;)

title: () São Pedro da Cadeira - 11 Travessa do Corado

Beach car park on top of a big cliff. Overlooking a beautiful beach with big waves.

title: (2530-656) Ribamar - 6 Estrada da Cardinha
description: Great and quiet place to sleep. We stayed here for one night with 4 other campers. There is enough space for 3 mobile homes and 2 smaller cars. There is a steep and narrow path to the beach (we managed it easily with a 4 year old) or a 10 minute flight of stairs. Proper bathing is only possible at low tide due to the high waves. Nevertheless, a very nice beach that is not overcrowded.

title: (2590) - 10 Avenida 25 de Abril

title: (2590) Forte do Alqueidão - N115

title: (2640) - Caminho dos Raposeiros

title: (2655) Ericeira -
description: Dirt parking lot bordered by reeds. It gives direct access to Ilhas Ribeira beach. Height limited to 2.2m. Access to showers (on the beach) and public toilets next to the restaurant. It seems that the police come by in the evening and impose fines (to be confirmed)

title: (2530) Ribamar - 3 Beco dos Venturas
description: Awesome parking on the seaside, end of the road, restaurants within walking distance. Wc and beach shower. And this evening, the sunset is admirable ...

title: (2530) Ribamar - 3 Beco dos Venturas
description:
We found this spot through Google maps. It is a park for caravans overlooking the ocean. It was just us here but it can take more than 10 vehicles. 
Just need to be careful not to park near the edges as it is located on top of a cliff.
Very quiet and peaceful place to stay the night.

title: (2640) Santo Isidoro -
description: Take a small dirt road along the surf reserve. You will find a car park where you will be alone in the world, just on the cliff overlooking Ericeira. Accessible to vehicles under 2.20m. Be careful to leave if it rains. Overnight stay is not allowed.

title: (2665-228) Malveira - 14 Largo da Feira

title: (2640) Mafra - 10 Rua Santa Casa Misericórdia

description: Intermarket supermarket in Ericeira, with parking, ASA ASA service station. with all services, sewage disposal, cassette disposal and clean water supply. at about 60m was inaugurated on 20/06/2020, another ASA, with parking for 8 motorhomes, is located in the new van Ericeira terminal, near the Mini preço supermarket, and the GNR station

title: (2655-139) Ericeira - N116
description: Campingaz in Intermarche

title: (2655) Ericeira - N116
description: LIDL Parking space designated for Motorhomes (Allowed to Park during the day only).

title: (2640-317) Igreja Nova - 135 N9
description:
A small picknick spot. many tables and lots of shade under the trees. Small toilet building and a working watertap.
Toilets are of French type (hole in ground) 
Trashcans available at street front.
Many stone bbq spots available, bring your own steel grill grate though.

title: (2665) Milharado - 42 Avenida de Portugal
description: Parking of the public park of Póvoa da galega, right in the middle of the village by the library and close to several stores. ok for a night or two.

title: (2665-335) Milharado - 9 Rua da Ermida
description: Water tank tap (probably no drinking water) with Gardena connection available and toilet on a large square with gas station and bus parking available.

title: (2530) Atalaia de Cima - 75 Estrada Porto das Barcas
title_short: (2530) Atalaia de Cima - 75 Estrada Porto das Barcas
description: Perfect for day and night !!.. Very quiet and rough sea, spectacular!

title: (2655-319) Ericeira - Estrada Nacional 247
description: Parking lot near to shopping mall (Sao Sebastiano). I spent there more nights without any problem. Laundry, bakery and other shopu are very close to this place. Center of Ericeira is less than 10 minutes by walk.

title: (2655-246) Ericeira - 3 Rua dos Bombeiros Voluntários
description: Parking without height limitation and with large spaces. Old bus station. ideal for visiting the center of Ericeira.

title: (2655-378) Ericeira - 1 Rua da Quinta
description: Parking parallel to the street. Flat and close to the center. Walk about 10 minutes. Behind the supermarket Continente.

title: (2655-210) Ericeira - 55 Bairro dos Pescadores
description: Parking right on the cliff with sea views

title: (2655-350) Ericeira -
description: Quiet place to spend the night in the Continent Supermarket car park ... and also if you approach the entrance you have free wifi. That less than doing some expense. Cement and level floor.

title: (2655-350) Ericeira - 6 Rua Ribeira da Baleia
description: Recently renovated, with tables, barbecues, plenty of shade, in front of the supermarket car park

title: (2655) Carvoeira - 117 Rua da Fonte
description: Perfect place to spend the night, by the river and in peace

title: (2655-272) Ericeira - 18 Largo dos Condes da Ericeira
title_short: (2655-272) Ericeira - 18 Largo dos Condes da Ericeira
description: It is a paid parking area. We found a place, paid the parking ticket and decided to sleep in the place, because we found it safe and quiet. It is very central and for camper vans it is a good place.

title: (2530-010) Atalaia - 13 Estrada Nossa Senhora da Guia
title_short: (2530-010) Atalaia - 13 Estrada Nossa Senhora da Guia
description: Toilets found very clean, certainly maintained by the parish or the commune. water point outside (not specified if drinkable but I suppose so). Small car park opposite the church, just behind, in the center of the village

title: (2655-255) Ericeira - 8 Travessa Calçada do Norte
description: Public toilets open year-round

title: (2630-260) Arruda dos Vinhos - 15 Rua Casal da Cruz
title_short: (2630-260) Arruda dos Vinhos - 15 Rua Casal da Cruz
description:
Intermarché parking. Renewed by the commercial establishment. All services are free. On the way to the west side. 1 place service station and 3 places for overnight stay
limit 72 h

title: (2655) Ericeira - 1 Rua das Furnas
description: Good place to park for the day. Overnight forbidden.

title: () - N247
description: Parking facing the ocean, unstabilized, access to the beach and not far from the center. Services are on the beach, toilets, showers, trash cans restaurants.

title: (2630) Santiago dos Velhos - Forte da Carvalha
title_short: (2630) Santiago dos Velhos - Forte da Carvalha
description: Small parking lot with tables and benches, we slept here one night alone and in silence, next to some castle ruins and a panoramic swing, it can fit 4 large motorhomes

title: (2530-112) Lourinhã -
description: DinoWash Self-service. New launderette (opening Feb 2022) with ironing service! Friendly owners, helpful and super clean!

title: (2530) Atalaia - 27 Rua Vale Bravo
description: The dirt road that leads to the beach: praia de paralta separates into two parts, take the one on the left. a long steep descent will give you access to a superb panorama from the top of the cliff. two places to sleep. quiet. no shade or services. just below some small houses. quiet sleep and beautiful view.

title: (2530) Lourinhã - 10 Rua Doutor Acácio Furtado
description: Free services area. Possibility of parking at the entrance of the city. Near a supermarket.

title: (2530-120) Lourinhã - 49 Rua do Catanho Menezes
description: Gas station Repsol!  There is a place for draining gray water!  There is a gun for refilling clean water!

title: (2655) Carvoeira - 1 N247
description: Parking at a small vantage point

title: (2530) Lourinhã - 47 Rua do Catanho Menezes
description: 5 kostenlose Stellplätze auf dem Lidl Parkplatz. Servicestation gegenüber bei Intermarche.

title: (2655-073) Carvoeira - 11 Rua da Cruz
description: Nice little picnic area just off the highway. EXCELLENT food truck selling homemade bread and snacks.

title: (2630-300) Arruda dos Vinhos - 7 Rua Manuel Silvestre
title_short: (2630-300) Arruda dos Vinhos - 7 Rua Manuel Silvestre
description: Very nice place, well equipped and with a beautiful view of the valley! I recommend !

title: (2530) Atalaia - 58 Portal da peralta
description: Facing Peralta beach. Slightly silted up in winter but a few places on bitumen remain available. Faucet nearby and toilets open in summer. Camping forbidden

title: () Lourinhã - 6 Rua Ildo Hermógenes da Silva Marques
title_short: () Lourinhã - 6 Rua Ildo Hermógenes da Silva Marques
description: Service area at the Intermarché store, lavomatique self services, 24h / 24h, all services

address.street: 6 Rua Ildo Hermógenes da Silva Marques

title: (2630) Santiago dos Velhos - 7 Est. Vl. Vedra
title_short: (2630) Santiago dos Velhos - 7 Est. Vl. Vedra
description: Vague land without services at the entrance of a village. Stayed one night without a problem and only the sounds of dogs barking in the village.

title: (2530) Lourinhã - 1 Rua Ildo Hermógenes da Silva Marques
title_short: (2530) Lourinhã - 1 Rua Ildo Hermógenes da Silva Marques
description: Laundry and dryer 365 days. It is perfect because it is next to a gas station, a supermarket and a complete service area.

address.street: 1 Rua Ildo Hermógenes da Silva Marques

title: (2655) Carvoeira - Rua dos Ombros
description: Mixed parking with cars and camper vans, in Praia do Foz Do Lizandro, restaurants, bars, terraces, beach and Foz do rio Lizandro

title: (2655-130) Carvoeira - 13 Rua do Brejo
description: Perfect for a night stay with an amazing view. Toilets open during the day. There is a skip in the car park for waste ended up staying two nights would recommend. Be careful when going to close to the sand as it is not stable and can get stuck but if you stay in the main car park all is ok.

title: (2705) São João das Lampas - 138 Avenida 10 de Agosto
title_short: (2705) São João das Lampas - 138 Avenida 10 de Agosto
description: 24h/7d laundry

title: (2705) São João das Lampas - 53 Estrada Á-dos-Serrados
title_short: (2705) São João das Lampas - 53 Estrada Á-dos-Serrados
description: July 2022. Loading of clean water with your own hose, emptying gray and black, all very well prepared for our needs and... FREE. A two minute walk to a washing station with 3 washing machines (9/16/18kg). And a bar to have a drink while the machines do their work

title: (2530-065) Lourinhã - 70 Estrada do Areal
description:
Parking lot, near to the beach.
Did not stay for the night. But it seemed like a quiet place

title: (2530-065) Lourinhã - 70 Estrada do Areal
description: Nice parking behind the dunes, ATTENTION the parking has been restricted, not suitable for large motorhomes, in the low season it is great, in the high season I don't know.

title: (2550) Ariero - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful panoramic views, 600m up, the highest point nearby by far, you can enjoy the sunrise and sunset next to the 18th century chapel, an old point of pilgrimage that still attracts visitors today. It's right next to a vast amount of antennas (ref highest point for miles), doesn't bother us but It'd look nicer without them. Opportunity to hike or bike to surrounding areas, no shade or services, easy road access, lots of space with relatively flat parking.

title: (2705) São João das Lampas - 265 Estrada de São Julião
title_short: (2705) São João das Lampas - 265 Estrada de São Julião
description: Parking next to the beach, surrounded by mountains. beautiful nature and the perfect cliffs, outdoor showers and toilets during the day. without water or electricity, gourds can be filled in an outdoor shower. can get crowded during the day.

title: (2530) Lourinhã - Largo da Foz
description: Parking of the Praia da Areia Branca. Motorhome and vans tolerated at the bottom of the car park, along the wall of the campsite. When vendors fold the stands, there are still more places. Quiet night, no services.

title: (2640) Cheleiros -
description: Location next to a road with almost no traffic. Green parking lot. Seems good for one night.

title: (2670-732) Fanhões - Estrada das Ribas
description:
Place to spend the night next to a park surrounded by nature. The area is level, shaded and silent. The park has many activities in nature for children and adults with zip lines and steps between trees.

Please note: you cannot stay overnight inside the large parking area of the park

title: (2705) São João das Lampas - Unnamed Road
title_short: (2705) São João das Lampas - Unnamed Road
description: (ONLY 4x4, NO VANS 4x4) Ideal place to spend the night in nature and away from the road, just at the edge of the cliff. To get there, it is accessed by a dirt track that descends from a nearby house. You have to be careful not to get in here with a van, there are steps that you need the height of an SUV.

title: (2670) Lousa - Rua Dom Manuel I
description: Flat land near a point of view. Very nice view around. Warning: very steep access on asphalt road, then arrived at the top we are on a dirt road that is muddy in case of rain. Road downhill so a little noisy.

title: (2530) Lourinhã - 4 Rua das Eirós
description: We are an English couple in our thirties offering a peaceful parking space with access to a toilet and shower. There are dogs, cats (kittens) and chickens on site. We also have an annex with a double bed/sofa bed. Booking is essential, please WhatsApp Danielle

title: (2670) Fanhões -
description: Small spot at the top of a plateau. Be careful it climbs hard and with the stones it skids but there is a parking lot at the top with a handicapped place. Quiet night, waking up in the morning with hunters in the distance and a few passages of quads. Nice view, especially at night with the lights of the surrounding towns, despite the wind turbines in the distance.

title: (2670) Lousa -
description: Small spot on the side of the road, quiet! Next to a nice ruined castle to "visit" very quickly! We didn't sleep there, but there was no sign prohibiting it.

title: (2670) Fanhões - Rua da Sociedade Recreativa
description: Several locations available on dirt roads in good condition therefore passable. Set back from the road so very quiet.

title: (2540) Bombarral - Estrada do Urmal
description: Near the soccer field and a not too noisy kart circuit

title: (2550) - Unnamed Road
description: End of the world for autonomous motorhomes, parking in the mountains, 2 tracks of 3 km of nature walk. Close to a campsite (not closed in winter). Windmills. Wind turbines on the horizon. Few telephone network, wifi at the campsite and free wifi Cadaval and office which serves as a tourist office.

name: Parque de Campismo Rural da Serra de Montejunto
title: (2580) Parque de Campismo Rural da Serra de Montejunto
title_short: (2580) Parque de Campismo Rural da Serra de Montejunto
description: Very nice camping place in nature. We must arrive till 5 PM. I spent just one day because i was finishing my August holidays. I will return as soon as possible.

title: (2705) São João das Lampas - 62 Caminho da Beira Mar
title_short: (2705) São João das Lampas - 62 Caminho da Beira Mar
description: Parking with panoramic view from the top of the cliffs. No services. Access by a good quality path for 1km. Possibility of going down to a large deserted beach. Caution steep descent. Let's be respectful if we want to continue to enjoy this exceptional place!

title: (2530-059) Lourinhã - 25 Rua Vale dos Dinossauros
description: Parking dino park. On the bus parking. In the heart of the forest. No light, no toilet or trash. We spent the night there, another motorhome joined us in the night.

title: (2640) Cheleiros - R. do Cemitério
description: Cemetery car park, on asphalt. Perfect for a stop in the shade of the trees. Place out of sight, calm, despite the barking in the distance like everywhere in Portugal.

title: (2705) São João das Lampas - 17 Estrada de São Julião
title_short: (2705) São João das Lampas - 17 Estrada de São Julião
description: Parking with picnic and barbecues. Very quiet. No services but there's a bar close by.

title: (2670) Lousa - Autoestrada do Oeste
description: Rest area of a Repsol gas station. There are 4 large squares, quite well leveled. Perfect for an overnight en route.

title: (2580 041) Abrigada - VA Rua da Liberdade
description: Service station for motorhomes. Located at the fire station. Intermarket and petrol station nearby.

title: (2580) Alenquer - N9
description: At the edge of the road but quiet, table and barbecue, very good inexpensive restaurant, friendly and French-speaker.

title: (2670) Lousa - IC1
description: Station service avec douche

title: (2715-719) Montelavar - 18 Rua Professor Rosa Génio Alves
title_short: (2715-719) Montelavar - 18 Rua Professor Rosa Génio Alves
description: Village water point. Super clean, several taps

title: (2630) Arruda dos Vinhos -
description: Provides: water; electricity; video surveillance; Facilities: pool access; Wi-Fi; pets allowed. Magnificent sunrise and sunset of the day. Recommend booking in advance. Advisable: maximum 4 pax per unit. Maximum 3 days

title: (2580) Alenquer - 2 Rua Serpa Pinto
description: Small flat parking area next to a derelict morgue.  100m away from the road. 10 min walk into the village with shops, restaurants and cafe’s.

title: (2705) São João das Lampas - 7 Avenida Amílcar Augusto Gil
title_short: (2705) São João das Lampas - 7 Avenida Amílcar Augusto Gil
description: Free Water

title: (2540) Bombarral -
description: (ASA de BOMBARRAL) - free service area with overnight parking for ten motorhomes (some shadows, others not) about 200 m behind the hypermarket Modelo/Continente. Quiet and safe place, with 250 m flat pedestrian access to city center (crossing railway line) and traditional grossery and municipal market. Several supermarkets around, municipal forest in city, tourist office, railway station (line to Lisboa), municipal museum, library and theater; kart race. In surrounding, ex-libris garden “Jardim Buddha Éden", in Quinta dos Louridos farm (to which there is also pedestrian access from parking through two trails and agricultural fields. Several wine farms (Quintas dos Louridos, do Sanguinhal, das Cerejeiras and da Granja) where taste is possible. Feel at home and in a family atmosphere!...

title: (2715-727) Montelavar - 14 Largo do Rossio
description: Public parking space across the street from a church. It only fits smaller vans though (max.6m) approx. 400ms away is a water fountain with drinking water, a small super market and a tiny Café. You can do nice hike to a small waterfall

title: (2530) Reguengo Grande - 26 N247-1
description: Service area in Reguengo Grande village, Lourinhã county, offers free full service for maintenance, located in the Town Picnic Park. Interesting to visit the "Ishmael Tasca" bar where is served the best “ginginha” (cerise liquor) of the region.

title: (2530) Reguengo Grande - 3 Rua do Cemitério
description: Prices

title: (2550) Cadaval - 20 Rua das Castanholas
description: Nice launderette, free WiFi available. Nearby is a park with playground.

title: (2705-709) São João das Lampas - 104 Avenida Doutor João Raúl Branco Guerreiro
title_short: (2705-709) São João das Lampas - 104 Avenida Doutor João Raúl Branco Guerreiro
description: Automatic laundry open till 22h. Good option specially because it has a good quick and cheap typical Portuguese restaurant in front. A lot of caravans here in take away.

address.street: 104 Avenida Doutor João Raúl Branco Guerreiro

title: (2580) - Rua das Carreiras
description: Parking above the village of Ota, beautiful 180 ° view, many picnic tables, a barbecue area and several water taps (2/3 of closed at this time). Ideal for a quiet alte quiet.

title: (2580-523) Alenquer -
description: Large clean and quiet parking two taps a few trash cans

title: (2715) Terrugem - 18 Avenida Doutor João Raúl Branco Guerreiro
title_short: (2715) Terrugem - 18 Avenida Doutor João Raúl Branco Guerreiro
description: Parking area for picnic (large parking for 10 ccar) with next to a pergola, 2 benches and a table. Well laid out place with pretty good view. Road a bit close and fairly short, but very good for a stop.

address.street: 18 Avenida Doutor João Raúl Branco Guerreiro

title: (2550-368) DaMinhaCasa Park - Cadaval - Rua fonte do Telheiro - Murteira
title_short: (2550-368) DaMinhaCasa Park - Cadaval - Rua fonte do Telheiro - Murteira
description: Country house with a beautiful view of the Montejunto mountain, offers parking for motorhomes, caravans and tents. Allows contact with nature: space with animals such as chickens and goats. Possibility to purchase homemade products such as cheese, eggs and bread. Our motto is: "Happiness is in the simple things"

title: (2525) Atouguia da Baleia - Unnamed Road
description: Small, flat location a few meters from Vale Pombas beach

title: (2580) - 1 Largo Doutor Mário Madeira
description: Water tap and public toilets in the center of cute tiny town of Ota. Opposite a nice café.

title: (2540) Carvalhal - Unnamed Road
description: Good point parking gardens, wineries, Buddhas, terracotta warriors and wine sales

title: (2705) São João das Lampas - 118 Estrada de São João
title_short: (2705) São João das Lampas - 118 Estrada de São João
description: Fountain by the road. Eye! Park after the bridge. Let's take care of the environment
